Do not copy down the part questions. Write only the answer against the proper number of the Question and its part according to the question Paper

sections.name: Section B - Short Answer Questions
instructions: Answer any EIGHT questions from this section

questions.question: List of any three advantages of designing flowchart.
What is a computer program?
Define the rules for naming variable.
What is the difference between Source code and Object code?
Differentiate between constant and variables.
Write the purpose of following escape sequence: (i) \n (ii) \t (iii) \b
Define ITERATION/LOOP.
Differentiate between Relational Operators and Logical Operators.
Define Queue and Stack.
Define the following: (i) Syntax error (ii) Logical error OR (i) Compiler (ii) Interpreter
What is the difference between Low-Level language and High-Level language?
Define Arithmetic assignment operators with examples.

sections.name: Section C - Detailed Answer Questions
instructions: Attempt any FOUR questions from this Section

questions.question: Explain the steps involved in problem solving.
Give description of the following codes and symbols: i) # include<iostream> ii) using namespace std; iii) Int main()
Define the following logic gates: (i) AND gate (ii) OR gate (iii) NOT gate
Differentiate between Algorithm and Flowchart.
Describe Tree and Graph.
Draw truth table of the following: (i) Y = A.B (ii) Y = A.B.C (iii) Y = Ä€B
